attributes.action: ensure that any GPs who resign from the NHS hand over the title deeds and keys to any cost or notional rent surgeries which they are using to run their business.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The taxpayer has funded the mortgages of GP cost rent surgeries for decades.  If GPs now decide to leave the NHS they should, at the same time, surrender all title to the buildings they currently use to see their patients.  After all, the taxpayer has paid for them so they belong to the taxpayer.
